mapper.select: SELECT productType.id AS productTYpeId, productType.typeName FROM wechat_product_restaurant AS restaurant, wechat_product AS product, wechat_option AS wechatOption, wechat_product_type AS productType WHERE adminRestaurantId = #{id} AND product.id = restaurant.productId AND restaurant.productType = 1 AND wechatOption.id = product.productLogo AND product.productType = productType.id group by productType.id

SELECT productPackage.id, wechatOption.id AS optionId, wechatOption.optionPath, productPackage.packageName, productPackage.packageDesc, productPackage.packagePrice, productPackage.createTime, productPackage.packageIntegral, productPackage.packageType, productPackage.packageStartTime, productPackage.packageEndTime, restaurant.productId, restaurant.productState, restaurant.productNum, restaurant.productNowNum FROM wechat_product_restaurant AS restaurant, wechat_product_package AS productPackage, wechat_option AS wechatOption WHERE adminRestaurantId = #{id} AND productPackage.id = restaurant.productId AND restaurant.productType = 2 AND wechatOption.id = productPackage.packageLogo
AND productPackage.packageName LIKE '%${packageName}%'

SELECT choosePakage.id, wechatOption.id AS optionId, wechatOption.optionPath, choosePakage.packageName, choosePakage.packageDesc, choosePakage.packagePrice, choosePakage.createTime, choosePakage.packageIntegral, choosePakage.packageType, choosePakage.packageStartTime, choosePakage.packageEndTime, restaurant.productId, restaurant.productState, restaurant.productNum, restaurant.productNowNum FROM wechat_product_restaurant AS restaurant, wechat_product_choose_package AS choosePakage, wechat_option AS wechatOption WHERE adminRestaurantId = #{id} AND choosePakage.id = restaurant.productId AND restaurant.productType = 3 AND wechatOption.id = choosePakage.packageLogo
AND choosePakage.packageName LIKE '%${packageName}%'
SELECT COUNT(id) as productNumber FROM wechat_product_restaurant WHERE adminRestaurantId = #{adminRestaurantId} AND productType = #{productType}

SELECT a.adminNo, b.realName, b.adminShopName, b.adminKfPhone, b.adminKfBusinessHours, b.adminRecommend, b.adminWorkPlace, b.adminWorkXCoordinate, b.adminWorkYCoordinate, b.adminCharacteristic FROM wechat_admin_login a, wechat_admin_login_mation b WHERE a.adminNo = #{adminNo} AND a.id = b.adminId AND ( a.adminIdentity = '1' )
